article_title: Is A Kinder, Gentler HMO On The Horizon?

article_metadata.author: Zina Moukheiber

og.description: When Indiana University Health ran the numbers on back surgeries its orthopedic surgeons performed, the eighteen-hospital system noticed they were way above national benchmarks. Imaging for lower back pain was more than twice acceptable norms. Confronted with the data, doctors devised an evidence-based set of instructions to help their colleagues [...]
